body_html:
@LowBoonKeong Sorry for missing the setup script. You'll need to rebuild with a Windows specific flag.

cd [path to ctc_release]\build2
REM clean the folder if needed

cmake .. -DCMAKE_WINDOWS_EXPORT_ALL_SYMBOLS=TRUE -DWITH_GPU=0 -G "Visual Studio 15 2017
 Win64"

And then try building the INSTALL.vcxproj with MSVC with admin permission. After that, copy the files in C:\Program Files\ctc_release into [path to ctc_release]\install. Finally, you can execute the setup script without any problem.

body:
@LowBoonKeong Sorry for missing the setup script. You'll need to rebuild with a Windows specific flag.
```CMD
cd [path to ctc_release]\build2
REM clean the folder if needed

cmake .. -DCMAKE_WINDOWS_EXPORT_ALL_SYMBOLS=TRUE -DWITH_GPU=0 -G "Visual Studio 15 2017
 Win64"
```
And then try building the `INSTALL.vcxproj` with MSVC with admin permission. After that, copy the files in `C:\Program Files\ctc_release` into `[path to ctc_release]\install`. Finally, you can execute the setup script without any problem.
